description.narrative: To build and analyse the baseline for impact evaluation for the Pró-Semiárido (Bahia), IFAD project in the state, as well as for the Dom Helder C mara Phase II Project, also supported by IFAD.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: 1. One Report containing the definition and review of the sampling design proposal for studying the baseline impact evaluation of IFAD‘s Pró-Semiárido project as well as for the Dom Helder Câmara Phase II Project delivered, 2. One Report containing the results of the consistency analysis of the databases, and the analytical framework delivered, 3. One Report containing the sampling design proposal for studying the baseline impact evaluation of IFAD’s projects in the states of Maranhão, Ceará and Piauí delivered. 4. One Report containing descriptive and inferential analysis delivered.

comment.narrative: 1. Need for a Report containing the definition and review of the sampling design proposal for studying the baseline impact evaluation of IFAD‘s Pró-Semiárido project in the state of Bahia, as well as for the Dom Helder Câmara Phase II Project—also supported by IFAD, which comprises the states of Alagoas, Ceará, Paraíba, Pernambuco, Piauí, Rio Grande do Norte, Sergipe, Bahia, Minas Gerais, Espírito Santo and Maranhão 2. Need for a Report containing the results of the consistency analysis of the databases, and the analytical framework (describing the structure of indicators, analytical plan, and methodological resources) underpinning a descriptive and inferential analysis of IFAD’s Pró-Semiárido project in the state of Bahia, as well as the Dom Helder Câmara Phase II Project—also supported by IFAD, which comprises the states of Alagoas, Ceará, Paraíba, Pernambuco, Piauí, Rio Grande do Norte, Sergipe, Bahia, Minas Gerais, Espírito Santo and Maranhão 3. Report containing the sampling design proposal for studying the baseline impact evaluation of IFAD’s projects in the states of Maranhão, Ceará and Piauí 4. Report containing descriptive and inferential analysis, including an executive summary and PowerPoint presentations, regarding IFAD’s project in the state of Bahia (Pró-Semiárido) and the Dom Helder Câmara Phase II Project, which comprises the states of Alagoas, Ceará, Paraíba, Pernambuco, Piauí, Rio Grande do Norte, Sergipe, Bahia, Minas Gerais, Espírito Santo and Maranhão

The products 3 and 4 have been modifified to be read as below:
3. Power Point presentation for the projects Paulo Freire (Ceará) , PROCASE (Paraíba) e Viva o Semiárido (Piauí) as per the work developed for the project Dom Távora (Sergipe).
4. Report containing inferential and descriptive analysis, with executive summary and Power Point presentations about IFAD project in Bahia (Pró-Semiárido), along with Power Point presentation comparing five IFAD projects, as follows: Paulo Freire (Ceará) , PROCASE (Paraíba) e Viva o Semiárido (Piauí), Dom Távora (Sergipe) and Pró-Semiárido (Bahia).

3. Power Point presentation for the projects Paulo Freire (Ceará) , PROCASE (Paraíba) e Viva o Semiárido (Piauí) as per the work developed for the project Dom Távora (Sergipe) delivered and approved.
4. Report containing inferential and descriptive analysis, with executive summary and Power Point presentations about IFAD project in Bahia (Pró-Semiárido), along with Power Point presentation comparing five IFAD projects, as follows: Paulo Freire (Ceará) , PROCASE (Paraíba) e Viva o Semiárido (Piauí), Dom Távora (Sergipe) and Pró-Semiárido (Bahia) delivered and approved.
